fields.name: Day 4:
fields.value:
Everything out in the field is different than how we thought in the lab. Even the very grass I walk on is mutated, several blades having fangs, jaws, mouths, some even having entire humanoid bodies. I tossed a branch into one of the gaping mouths, and the grass chomped down, snapping the branch in half. I'll need to be careful with where I walk, but I might be able to use the grass to fend off predators later in my expedition...
Attack: Powerful
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Wait outside a player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anybody who visit's your target at night will be attacked.
- If your target visits at night, they will be attacked.
- If your target is a kill capable role and is attacked by you, they will attack you with their strongest attack.
- If you do not visit, you kill all visitors to you.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: - Kill all who oppose the Florae.
